body_html:
I've just found that when running a tensorflow python script using '$python ~.py', GPU was used.
But if the script is built with bazel and execute binary, GPU was not used.
FYI, I've put my code on tensorflow/example/myproject directory in tensorflow source location.

FYI, I've put my code on tensorflow/example/myproject directory in tensorflow source location.
body:
I've just found that when running a tensorflow python script using '$python ~.py', GPU was used. 
But if the script is built with bazel and execute binary, GPU was not used.
FYI, I've put my code on tensorflow/example/myproject directory in tensorflow source location.
